articles.author: Nandita Bose, Andrea Shalal, Jeff Mason
articles.title: In Michigan, Harris meets Arab American leaders angry over Israel - Reuters
articles.description: Vice President Kamala Harris met with Arab American and Muslim leaders in Flint, Michigan, on Friday, as her presidential campaign seeks to win back voters angry at U.S. support for Israel's wars in Gaza and Lebanon.

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/ShaolinTomReporter
articles.title: Houthis Vow 'America Will Pay a Heavy Price' for Bombing Yemen Amid Crisis - Newsweek
articles.description: "We consider it an escalation and a brutal aggression, and we will confront it with escalation," an Ansar Allah official told Newsweek.
articles.content: A senior official of the Iran-aligned Ansar Allah movement, also known as the Houthis, has told Newsweek there would be severe consequences for the United States after it conducted a new round of str… [+7657 chars]
